hero.title: Nagarkot Panoramic Hiking Trail
hero.description: A scenic ~12 km loop hike with breathtaking Himalayan vistas along the ridge above Nagarkot.

about.terrain: Gentle ridge‑trail, village path and forest segments

locationRoute.fromKathmandu: Drive 1.5 hours east to Nagarkot; hike begins at local gardens/village trailheads

hero.title: Boudhanath Stupa
hero.description: One of the world’s largest Buddhist stupas and a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

locationRoute.fromKathmandu: Taxi or tuk‑tuk to Boudhanath; short walk around the stupa

hero.title: Chandragiri Cable Car Tour
hero.description: Scenic cable car ride up Chandragiri Hill offering Himalayan and Kathmandu Valley views.

locationRoute.fromKathmandu: Drive ~30 km southwest; cable‑car station at base of hill

booking.tourOperators: Cable‑car tours from Kathmandu from ~USD 50–90 including transport

hero.title: Chitwan Jungle Safari Tour
hero.description: Safari in Chitwan National Park with wildlife viewing, canoe rides, and Tharu cultural experiences.

features: Jeep or walking safari for rhinos & birds

locationRoute.fromKathmandu: 4–6 hours drive to Sauraha or Bharatpur airport then transfer to lodge

packages.2‑night/3‑day: USD 200–270 per person including transport, accommodation, meals & activities

booking.operators: Multiple lodge-based safari operators in Chitwan

hero.title: Pashupatinath Temple
hero.description: Nepal’s holiest Hindu temple on the Bagmati, UNESCO World Heritage Site with daily rituals.

locationRoute.fromKathmanduAirport: ≈ 15 min drive from airport; taxis or local buses available

hero.title: Shivapuri National Park Day Hike
hero.description: Forest trail hike to Shivapuri Peak with dense forest, Bagdwar source of Bagmati, monastery stop and Himalayan views.

about.terrain: Managed forest paths, rhododendron & oak woodland
highlights: Birding and wildlife in Shivapuri National Park

locationRoute.fromKathmandu: Drive ~40 min to Budhanilkantha/Sundarijal; hike via Bagdwar to Nagi Gompa and Shivapuri peak, return same

booking.package: Approximately USD 30–100 per person depending on group size & services

hero.title: Namobuddha & Panauti Day Tour
hero.description: Spiritual pilgrimage at Namobuddha monastery followed by cultural exploration of medieval town Panauti.

features: Hill‑top Buddhist monastery with legend of Buddha’s self‑sacrifice
Medieval Newari architecture in Panauti including Indreshwar Temple

locationRoute.fromKathmandu: Drive southeast ~1.5 hours via Banepa to Namobuddha hike, then continue to Panauti return to Kathmandu

booking.TourPackages: USD 35–65 per person depending on group size

hero.title: Dhulikhel & Surroundings Scenic Day Tour
hero.description: Hill town Dhulikhel with Himalayan panoramas, traditional Newari culture, and optional side‑visits to Namobuddha and Panauti.

locationRoute.fromKathmandu: Drive east to Dhulikhel, view points, local bazaar; optionally continue to Namobuddha and Panauti

booking.packages: USD 35–60 per person including transport and guide
